item.title: [FLINK-24358] flink-avro-glue-schema-registry fails compiling with scala 2.12 due to dependency convergence

item.summary: flink-avro-glue-schema-registry fails compiling with scala 2.12 due to dependency convergence

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
It's wired this does not fail other stages.
cc chesnay, any insights?
Maybe there is some Scala dependency that has a slightly different dependency set between 2.11/2.12? I can't really think of anything else. In any case it would be good to resolve the conflicts.
It turns out this module is only included with scala 2.12.
Thanks xtsong, why did this not fail when building locally, or in the PR CI? Once the AVRO dependencies are fixed there may be a similar issue in the JSON module

Thanks chesnay, how would we reproduce this locally? Build passes for me when running 

mvn clean install -Pscala-2.12 -Dscala-2.12

From

  • flink-avro-glue-schema-registry
  • flink-formats
ok, so the json module fails too, I will see if the PR fixes both and if not, create a new PR

dannycranmer,
No, the PR doesn't fix for the json module. I'll update the PR. I'm updating it for the CI tests anyway.

PR updated.
Building flink-formats succeed for me locally.
Reopen for the same problem in e2e test modules.
